scripts.build: npm run build-mac && npm run build-win && npm run build-win32
scripts.build-mac: electron-packager ./ Croqujs --app-bundle-id=croqujs --icon=./res/icon.icns --asar --prune --out=package --overwrite=true --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.3.13  --app-version=4.0.0 --version-string.FileDescription=Croqujs && cd 'dist/Croqujs-darwin-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Croqujs-darwin-x64.zip '../Croqujs-darwin-x64' && cd ../../
scripts.build-win: electron-packager ./ Croqujs --app-bundle-id=croqujs --icon=./res/icon --asar --prune --out=package --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64  --electron-version=1.3.13 --app-version=4.0.0 --version-string.FileDescription=Croqujs && cd dist/Croqujs-win32-x64 && del LICENSE* version && cd ../../
scripts.build-win32: electron-packager ./ Croqujs --app-bundle-id=croqujs --icon=./res/icon --asar --prune --out=package --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --electron-version=1.3.13 --app-version=4.0.0 --version-string.FileDescription=Croqujs && cd dist/Croqujs-win32-ia32 && del LICENSE* version && cd ../../
scripts.copy:codemirror: mkdirp ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/mode/javascript && mkdirp ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/lib && mkdirp ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/addon && cpx ./node_modules/codemirror/lib/* ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/lib && cpx ./node_modules/codemirror/addon/**/* ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/addon && cpx ./node_modules/codemirror/mode/javascript/* ./dist/renderer_study/lib/codemirror/mode/javascript
